comment:
* Utility class to convert the legacy softap.conf file format to the new XML format. * Note: *
  • This should be modified by the OEM if they want to migrate configuration for existing * devices for new softap features supported by AOSP in Android 11. * For ex: client allowlist/blocklist feature was already supported by some OEM's before Android 10 * while AOSP only supported it in Android 11.
    • *
  • Most of this class was copied over from WifiApConfigStore class in Android 10 and * SoftApStoreData class in Android 11
    • * @hide

variables.name: LEGACY_WIFI_STORE_DIRECTORY_NAME
variables.comment: * Directory to read the wifi config store files from under.

variables.name: LEGACY_AP_CONFIG_FILE
variables.comment: * The legacy Softap config file which contained key/value pairs.

variables.name: WIFICONFIG_AP_BAND_ANY
variables.comment:
* Device is allowed to choose the optimal band (2Ghz or 5Ghz) based on device capability,
     * operating country code and current radio conditions.

variables.name: CONFIG_STORE_DATA_VERSION
variables.comment: This is the version that Android 11 released with.

methods.name: public static int convertWifiConfigBandToSoftApConfigBand(int wifiConfigBand)
methods.comment:
* Convert band from WifiConfiguration into SoftApConfiguration
     *
     * @param wifiConfigBand band encoded as WIFICONFIG_AP_BAND_xxxx
     * @return band as encoded as SoftApConfiguration.BAND_xxx

methods.name: private static SoftApConfiguration loadFromLegacyFile(InputStream fis)
methods.comment:
* Load AP configuration from legacy persistent storage.
     * Note: This is deprecated and only used for migrating data once on reboot.

methods.name: public static InputStream convert(InputStream fis)
methods.comment:
* Read the legacy /data/misc/wifi/softap.conf file format and convert to the new XML
     * format understood by WifiConfigStore.
     * Note: Used for unit testing.

methods.name: public static InputStream convert()
methods.comment:
* Read the legacy /data/misc/wifi/softap.conf file format and convert to the new XML
     * format understood by WifiConfigStore.
